drRaunak.name: Dr. Raunak Shinde
drRaunak.description: Board-Certified Plastic and Cosmetic Surgeon with Expertise in Aesthetic Surgery.

drKavisha.name: Dr. Kavisha Shinde
drKavisha.description: Board Certified Consultant Gynaecologist and Infertility Specialist

drRaunak.name: Dr. Raunak Shinde
drRaunak.tagline: Director & Chief Cosmetic Surgeon | M.Ch. Plastic Surgery (PGIMER)
drRaunak.intro1: As the Director of Roop Plastic Surgery Clinique and Infertility Counselling Centre in Ujjain, Madhya Pradesh, Dr. Shinde brings over 13 years of surgical expertise in plastic, cosmetic, and reconstructive surgery.
drRaunak.intro2: Trained at India's premier institutions including PGIMER Chandigarh, IPGMER Kolkata, and KEM Hospital Mumbai, Dr. Shinde is dedicated to transforming lives through personalized care and exceptional results.
drRaunak.statementOfPurpose: "Transforming lives, one procedure at a time."
drRaunak.statementDescription: As a board-certified Plastic, Cosmetic, and Reconstructive Surgeon, I specialize in aesthetic surgery and hand surgery, delivering personalized care and great results. With a commitment to ethical practice and a holistic approach to life, while adhering to the highest standards of patient safety, I strive to enhance natural beauty and restore function.
drRaunak.expertiseDescription: Dr. Raunak Shinde specializes in advanced procedures spanning facial rejuvenation, body contouring, reconstructive procedures, and hand surgery with natural-looking results.
drRaunak.surgicalInterest1: Trauma Reconstruction – Craniofacial, Hand, Lower Limb, Microvascular Replantations, Free Flaps
drRaunak.surgicalInterest2: General Aesthetic Surgery and Facial Aesthetic Surgery
drRaunak.surgicalInterest6: Peripheral Nerve Injuries & Brachial Plexus Injuries
drRaunak.training1: IAAPS Fellowship in Aesthetic Surgery – Tamira Plastic Surgery Centre, Chennai (2022)
drRaunak.training4: APSI Hand & Upper Extremity Accreditation – Ganga Hospital (2018)
drRaunak.training6: Advanced Breast & Body Contouring Workshop – Personiks & Cocoona Academy, Hyderabad
drRaunak.qualification1: IAAPS Recognised Fellowship in Aesthetic Surgery – Tamira Plastic Surgery Centre, Chennai (2022)
drRaunak.qualification3: M.S. General Surgery – IPGMER & SSKM Hospital, Kolkata (2012-2015)
drRaunak.qualification4: M.B.B.S. – Seth G.S. Medical College & KEM Hospital, Mumbai (2004-2010) with Distinction in Biochemistry, Pharmacology, Ophthalmology
drRaunak.personalizedCareDescription: With over 13 years of surgical expertise, Dr. Shinde combines advanced training with a compassionate approach, ensuring tailored treatments and natural results for every patient while adhering to the highest standards of safety.
drRaunak.award1: Best Paper Presentation Award – 14th Annual NZAPSCON, Kasauli, HP (2018)
drRaunak.award2: Best Paper Award – 59th Foundation Day, IPGMER, Kolkata (2015)
drRaunak.award3: National Level Science Talent Search – AIR 24 (2004)
drRaunak.award4: Certificate of Merit – National Biology Olympiad, NSEB (2003-2004)
drRaunak.association1: Association of Plastic Surgeons of India (APSI)
drRaunak.association2: Indian Association of Aesthetic Plastic Surgeons (IAAPS)
drRaunak.association3: The Association of Surgeons of India (ASI)
drRaunak.association5: Indian Society for Surgery of the Hand (ISSH)
drRaunak.association6: Association of Plastic Surgeons of MP & Chattisgarh (APMPCG)
drRaunak.publication1: "Free Flap Skin Paddle: A Painless Donor Site In Vivo" – Indian Journal of Plastic Surgery (2019)
drRaunak.publication2: "Inflammatory Myofibroblastic Tumor Arising in the Pancreatic Head" – Indian Journal of Surgery (2015)
drRaunak.publication3: Research on psychosocial and surgical outcomes of breast reconstruction following mastectomy
drRaunak.conference1: Invited Faculty – Scar Revision Tips & Tricks – MP-CUTICON (2023)
drRaunak.conference2: Invited Paper – FUE for Advanced Male Pattern Baldness – AESURGE (2023)
drRaunak.conference3: ISAPS Hands-On Cadaver Course on Facial Aesthetic Surgery, Noida (2023)
drRaunak.conference5: Multiple APSI, ISPNS, and ASI national conferences

drKavisha.name: Dr. Kavisha Shinde
drKavisha.tagline: Chief Consultant Infertility Specialist | MS Obstetrics & Gynaecology
drKavisha.intro: Dedicated to empowering women's health and fertility with over 13 years of surgical experience and 7+ years of expertise in reproductive medicine. Dr. Kavisha is committed to delivering compassionate, evidence-based care to women and couples navigating fertility challenges.
drKavisha.statementOfPurpose: "Dedicated to Empowering Women's Health and Fertility"
drKavisha.statementDescription: With a strong foundation in gynecological surgery and a passion for staying at the forefront of advancements in reproductive technology, my goal is to provide personalized, protocol-driven treatment that honors the unique needs and aspirations of each patient. I strive to create a supportive, inclusive environment where patients feel informed, empowered, and hopeful.
drKavisha.expertiseDescription: Specialized in infertility treatment, ART procedures, and gynecological care with a compassionate, patient-centered approach.
drKavisha.experience1: Registrar – CK Birla Hospital, CMRI, Kolkata (2015)
drKavisha.experience3: Gynaecologist – National Health Mission, U.T., Chandigarh (2016-2017)
drKavisha.experience4: Senior Resident – Govt. Medical College & Hospital, Chandigarh (2018)
drKavisha.qualification1: D.C.R. Diploma in Clinical ART – Amity University & Indian Fertility Society, Wing's Hospital, Ahmedabad (2020-2021)
drKavisha.qualification2: MS (Obstetrics & Gynaecology) – MGM Medical College, Indore (2012-2015)
drKavisha.qualification3: MBBS – MGM Medical College, Indore (2005-2011) with Distinction in Pediatrics
drKavisha.qualification4: Thesis: Comparative study of induction of labour with mechanical dilatation vs misoprostol
drKavisha.course1: Fellowship in Infertility (DCR) – Amity University & IFS, Wing's Hospital, Ahmedabad (under Dr. Jayesh Amin)
drKavisha.course2: Laparoscopy Training – Marigold Women's Hospital, Ahmedabad (under Dr. Devang Kanugo)
drKavisha.course3: FOGSI Ultrasound Training – Rajni Fetal Medicine Center, Ahmedabad (under Dr. Jayprakash Shah)
drKavisha.course4: Infertility Training – Institute of Reproductive Medicine, Kolkata (under Dr. B.N. Chakravarty)
drKavisha.course5: Post Graduate Skill Course in OBGY – SAIMS Laparoscopy Academy, Indore
drKavisha.course6: BMJ Learning Program – Endocrine & Diabetic Problems in Pregnancy
drKavisha.conference1: E-Poster Presentation – Role of Lymphocyte Immunization Therapy in RIF/RPL – Fertivision (2020)
drKavisha.conference3: Dissertation: Comparison of clinical outcomes of single vs double blastocyst transfer in ART
drKavisha.association1: Federation of Obstetric and Gynaecological Societies of India (FOGSI)

PrivacyPolicyPage.title: Privacy Policy
PrivacyPolicyPage.introContent: At Roop Clinique, we are committed to protecting your privacy and ensuring the security of your personal information. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you visit our website or use our services.
PrivacyPolicyPage.infoCollectContent: We may collect the following types of personal information:
PrivacyPolicyPage.infoCollect1: Personal identification information (name, email address, phone number)
PrivacyPolicyPage.infoCollect2: Medical history and health information relevant to your treatment
PrivacyPolicyPage.useInfoContent: We use the information we collect for the following purposes:
PrivacyPolicyPage.useInfo1: To provide and improve our medical and cosmetic services
PrivacyPolicyPage.useInfo2: To schedule appointments and communicate with you about your care
PrivacyPolicyPage.useInfo3: To process payments and maintain billing records
PrivacyPolicyPage.useInfo4: To comply with legal obligations and medical record-keeping requirements
PrivacyPolicyPage.dataSecurityContent: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction. All medical records are stored securely in compliance with applicable healthcare regulations.
PrivacyPolicyPage.thirdPartyContent: We do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer your personal information to outside parties except as required by law or with your explicit consent. We may share information with trusted third parties who assist us in operating our clinic, provided they agree to keep this information confidential.
PrivacyPolicyPage.yourRights1: Access and review your personal information
PrivacyPolicyPage.yourRights3: Request deletion of your data (subject to legal retention requirements)
PrivacyPolicyPage.contactContent: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy or our data practices, please contact us at roopclinique3@gmail.com or call us at 7024411704.

TermsConditionsPage.title: Terms & Conditions
TermsConditionsPage.introContent: Welcome to Roop Clinique. By accessing our website or using our services, you agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions. Please read them carefully before proceeding.
TermsConditionsPage.useServicesContent: By using our services, you agree to:
TermsConditionsPage.useServices1: Provide accurate and complete information during registration and consultations
TermsConditionsPage.useServices2: Follow pre-operative and post-operative instructions provided by our medical staff
TermsConditionsPage.useServices3: Not use our services for any unlawful purpose or in violation of any applicable regulations
TermsConditionsPage.medicalConsultContent: All medical consultations are provided by qualified healthcare professionals. The information provided during consultations is based on your disclosed medical history and examination. Final treatment decisions are made collaboratively between you and your treating physician.
TermsConditionsPage.appointmentsContent: We value your time and ours. Please adhere to the following appointment policies:
TermsConditionsPage.appointments1: Appointments should be scheduled in advance via phone or our booking system
TermsConditionsPage.appointments2: Cancellations should be made at least 24 hours before the scheduled appointment
TermsConditionsPage.appointments3: Repeated no-shows may result in a booking deposit requirement for future appointments
TermsConditionsPage.paymentContent: Payment is due at the time of service unless otherwise arranged. We accept various payment methods including cash, credit/debit cards, and select digital payment platforms. Detailed cost estimates will be provided before any procedure.
TermsConditionsPage.intellectualPropertyContent: All content on this website, including text, graphics, logos, images, and software, is the property of Roop Clinique and is protected by intellectual property laws. You may not reproduce, distribute, or use any content without our express written permission.
TermsConditionsPage.liabilityContent: While we strive to provide the best possible care, medical procedures carry inherent risks. Roop Clinique and its staff shall not be held liable for outcomes that vary from expectations, complications arising from non-disclosure of medical history, or failure to follow post-operative instructions.
TermsConditionsPage.governingLawContent: These Terms and Conditions are governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of India. Any disputes arising from these terms shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts in Ujjain, Madhya Pradesh.
TermsConditionsPage.contactContent: If you have any questions about these Terms and Conditions, please contact us at roopclinique3@gmail.com or call us at 7024411704.

DisclaimerPage.title: Disclaimer
DisclaimerPage.generalContent: The information provided on this website is for general informational purposes only. While we strive to keep the information accurate and up-to-date, Roop Clinique makes no representations or warranties of any kind, express or implied, about the completeness, accuracy, reliability, suitability, or availability of the information contained on the website.
DisclaimerPage.medicalContent: The content on this website is not intended to be a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment. Always seek the advice of your physician or other qualified health provider with any questions you may have regarding a medical condition.
DisclaimerPage.medical1: Never disregard professional medical advice or delay in seeking it because of something you have read on this website
DisclaimerPage.medical2: The website does not recommend or endorse any specific tests, physicians, procedures, opinions, or other information
DisclaimerPage.medical3: Reliance on any information provided by this website is solely at your own risk
DisclaimerPage.resultsContent: Individual results from cosmetic and plastic surgery procedures vary significantly from person to person. Results depend on multiple factors including but not limited to individual anatomy, skin quality, healing capacity, lifestyle factors, and adherence to post-operative care instructions. No guarantee of specific results can be made.
DisclaimerPage.photosContent: All photographs of patients displayed on this website have been taken only after obtaining explicit written consent from the patient for record keeping and publication purposes. Patient identity is never divulged, and all identifying features are protected or obscured where necessary. These images are used solely for educational and informational purposes to demonstrate possible outcomes of procedures. Individual results will vary significantly based on personal factors, and these photos should not be considered a guarantee of similar results.
DisclaimerPage.linksContent: This website may contain links to external websites that are not provided or maintained by Roop Clinique. Please note that we do not guarantee the accuracy, relevance, timeliness, or completeness of any information on these external websites.
DisclaimerPage.noGuaranteeContent: While our team of qualified surgeons and medical professionals are highly skilled and experienced, no medical procedure is without risk. We do not guarantee any specific outcome or result. All procedures and treatments carry potential risks and complications which will be discussed during your consultation.
DisclaimerPage.changesContent: We reserve the right to modify or replace this Disclaimer at any time. Changes will be effective immediately upon posting on this website. Your continued use of the website after any changes indicates your acceptance of the modified Disclaimer.
DisclaimerPage.contactContent: If you have any questions about this Disclaimer, please contact us at roopclinique3@gmail.com or call us at 7024411704.

hero.title: Roop Plastic Surgery Clinique And Infertility Counselling Centre
hero.subtitle: Where Compassion Meets Expertise, and Hope Meets Reality!
hero.description: Guided by Dr. Kavisha, a luminary in reproductive medicine with over a decade of experience, bringing unparalleled expertise and unwavering commitment.

understanding.title: Understanding Infertility
understanding.description: A complex interplay of physical, emotional, and psychological factors affecting millions worldwide
understanding.enigmaDesc: Primary and secondary infertility are distinct yet equally challenging conditions that we address with precision and personalized care.
understanding.culpritsDesc: From lifestyle choices to underlying medical conditions, we explore all causes comprehensively, leaving no stone unturned.

treatments.title: Treatment Modalities
treatments.subtitle: A Tailored Approach to Your Unique Journey

iui.name: IUI
iui.description: A gentle procedure where prepared sperm is inserted directly into the uterus, increasing chances of fertilization.
iui.step3: Inserted via thin catheter during ovulation

ivf.name: IVF
ivf.description: Revolutionary technique where eggs are fertilized with sperm outside the body and transferred to the uterus.

opu.name: OPU
opu.description: Minor surgical procedure to retrieve eggs from ovaries.

embryoTransfer.name: Embryo Transfer
embryoTransfer.description: Final step in IVF, where embryos are transferred to the uterus.

eggDonation.name: Egg Donation
eggDonation.description: Option for women unable to produce viable eggs.

eggFreezing.name: Egg Freezing
eggFreezing.description: Preserve fertility for future family planning.

counselling.title: Counselling Support
counselling.subtitle: A Shoulder to Lean On Throughout Your Journey

individual.title: Individual Counselling
individual.description: One-on-one sessions tailored to address your concerns, fears, and aspirations.

couple.title: Couple Counselling
couple.description: Joint sessions to strengthen relationships and foster deeper connections.

group.title: Group Counselling
group.description: Shared experiences, collective support, and a sense of community.

guidelines.title: Treatment Guidelines
guidelines.subtitle: Essential Do's and Don'ts During Treatment
guidelines.do3: Maintain balanced diet and regular exercise
guidelines.dont3: No high-impact activities or heavy lifting

doctor.subtitle: A Luminary in Reproductive Medicine
doctor.description: With an unyielding passion for infertility treatment, Dr. Kavisha brings a wealth of experience, expertise, and empathy. Her tireless efforts have transformed countless lives, earning her a reputation as a leading expert in the field.

cta.title: Take the First Step
cta.description: Embark on this transformative journey with us. Schedule a consultation with Dr. Kavisha, and let our team guide you towards parenthood.
